{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1965 |Team=Wyoming Cowboys |Image= |ImageSize = |Conference=Western Athletic Conference |Division= |ShortConference=WAC |Record=6-4 |ConfRecord=3-2 |CoachRank=Not ranked |APRank=Not ranked |HeadCoach=[[Lloyd Eaton]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |Stadium=[[War Memorial Stadium (Wyoming)|War Memorial Stadium]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} The '''1965 Wyoming Cowboys football team''' represented the [[University of Wyoming]] in the 1965 NCAA football season. The Cowboys offense scored 201 points while the defense allowed 182 points. Led by head coach Lloyd Eaton, the Cowboys finished the season with six wins. ==Schedule== * In the [[Border War (Colorado State vs. Wyoming)|Border War]], Wyoming defeated [[Colorado State Rams|Colorado State]] by a score of 23-6 to claim the [[Bronze Boot]] trophy. {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#593D2B;color:#DDCCA5;" | '''Game''' || '''Date''' || '''Opponent''' || '''Result''' || '''Cowboys points''' || '''Opponents''' || '''Record''' |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 1 || Sept. 18 || {{cfb link|year=1965|team=Air Force Falcons|title=Air Force}} || Win || 13 || 0 || 1-0 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 2 || Sept. 25|| @ {{cfb link|year=1965|team=Colorado State Rams|title=Colorado State}} || Win ||23 ||6 || 2-0 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 3 || Oct. 2 || {{cfb link|year=1965|team=Arizona Wildcats|title=Arizona}} || Win ||36 ||6|| 3-0 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 4 ||Oct. 9|| @ [[1965 Utah Utes football team|Utah]] || Loss || 3|| 42|| 3-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 5 || Oct. 16|| {{cfb link|year=1965|team=UTEP Miners|title=Texas El-Paso}} || Win || 37|| 7|| 4-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 6 || Oct. 23 || {{cfb link|year=1965|team=BYU Cougars|title=Brigham Young}} || Win || 35 ||10|| 5-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 7 || Nov. 6|| @ {{cfb link|year=1965|team=New Mexico Lobos|title=New Mexico}} ||Win || 10 || 12 ||6-1 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 8 || Nov. 13 || @ {{cfb link|year=1965|team=Army Black Knights|title=Army}} || Loss || 0 || 13 || 6-2 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 9 || Nov. 20|| @ {{cfb link|year=1965|team=Arizona State Sun Devils|title=Arizona State}} || Loss || 31|| 7|| 6-3 |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 10 || Nov. 27 || @ [[1965 USC Trojans football team|Southern California]] || Loss || 47 || 14 || 6-4 |- align="center" bgcolor="" |}<ref>http://cfreference.net/cfr/school.s?id=442&season=1965</ref>
